com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2

Class ErrorPkg

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.ErrorPkg

  • public class ErrorPkg
extends java.lang.Object
    A flexible library message reporting facility which supports customisation of messages using a plain text messages file. See the description of init for usage information. Uses the debug, support and user level loggers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorPkg()

      Get the message for a given message identifier/name, replacing each token specified in args with the corresponding value specified in vals.

      Get the message for a given message identifier/name, replacing the specified token identified by arg with the value specified by val.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Initialise the ErrorPkg class from a messages file. This is automatically called at the time the class is loaded. Ths messages definition file must be in the classpath.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The messages couldn't be loaded from a message file into the internal Properties object.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - The messages file couldn't be found.

      • getMessage

        public static java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String name)
        Get the message for a given message identifier/name.
        Parameters:
        name - The identifier of a message, as specified as a key in the messages file.
        Returns:
        The value in the loaded messages file corresponding to the key identified by the name parameter.

      • getMessage

        public static java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String arg,
                          java.lang.String val)
        Get the message for a given message identifier/name, replacing the specified token identified by arg with the value specified by val.
        Parameters:
        name - The identifier of a message, as specified as a key in the messages file.
        arg - The token identifier to replace.
        val - The value to replace the token identifier with.
        Returns:
        The value in the loaded messages file corresponding to the key identified by the name parameter, with the token name replaced by the given value.

      • getMessage

        public static java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String[] args,
                          java.lang.String[] vals)
        Get the message for a given message identifier/name, replacing each token specified in args with the corresponding value specified in vals.
        Parameters:
        name - The identifier of a message, as specified as a key in the messages file.
        args - The array of token identifiers to replace.
        vals - The array of values to replace the token identifiers with.
        Returns:
        The value in the loaded messages file corresponding to the key identified by the name parameter, with the token identifiers replaced by the given value.

      • getMessage

        public static java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String[] args,
                          int[] vals)
        Returns the message.
        Parameters:
        name - The identifier of a message, as specified as a key in the messages file.
        args - The array of token identifiers to replace.
        vals - The array of values to replace the token identifiers with.
        Returns:
        The value in the loaded messages file corresponding to the key identified by the name parameter, with the token identifiers replaced by the given value.
